General.Name: Royal Helium Ltd
General.Description: Royal Helium Ltd. engages in the exploration and development of helium properties in Canada. It holds approximately 1,000,000 acres of prospective helium land across southern Saskatchewan and southeastern Alberta. The company is headquartered in Saskatoon, Canada.
General.Address: 224 4th Avenue South, Saskatoon, SK, Canada, S7K 5M5
